hero.headline: A Cleaner Home. A Happier Life.
hero.subheadline: Eco-Friendly Cleaning • Background-Checked Teams • Satisfaction Guaranteed

about.title: Professional Cleaning, Personal Touch
about.text: Sparkle Clean Pro was founded with a simple mission: deliver spotless results with products that are safe for your family, pets, and planet. Our professionally trained, background-checked teams use eco-friendly cleaning supplies and follow a detailed 50-point checklist. If you're not 100% satisfied, we'll re-clean for free.

services.name: Regular Cleaning
services.description: Weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly visits to keep your home consistently clean and fresh.

services.name: Deep Cleaning
services.description: Comprehensive top-to-bottom cleaning. Perfect for spring cleaning or before special events.

services.name: Move In/Out Cleaning
services.description: Get your security deposit back or start fresh in your new home. Detailed cleaning that landlords love.

services.name: Office Cleaning
services.description: Professional workspace cleaning with flexible scheduling. Evening and weekend availability.

testimonials.name: Lisa M.
testimonials.content: I've tried 4 cleaning services over the years. Sparkle Clean Pro is by far the best. Consistent, thorough, and always on time.

testimonials.name: James & Emily R.
testimonials.content: With two kids and a dog, our house was always chaos. Now it's spotless every Tuesday. Worth every penny!

testimonials.name: Dr. Rachel S.
testimonials.content: They clean my dental office after hours. Impeccable attention to detail and great communication.
